terrace.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a row of houses that are joined to each other, or a street with one of these rows in it
terrace.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a flat outdoor area next to a building or on a roof, where you can sit outside to eat, relax etc
terrace.translation[0].definitions[2].de: one of a series of flat areas cut out of a hill like steps, and used to grow crops
